verse.name: v2
verse.lines: BISHOP: Beloved sons, on the anniversary of that day when Christ our Lord conferred his priesthood on his Apostles and on us,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: are you resolved to renew, in the presence of your Bishop and God's holy people, the promises you once made?

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: BISHOP: Are you resolved to be more united with the Lord Jesus and more closely conformed to him, defying yourselves

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: and confirming those promises about sacred duties towards Christ's Church which, promoted by love of him, you willingly and joyfully pledged on the day of your priestly ordination?

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: BISHOP: Are you resolved to be faithful stewards of the mysteries of God in the Holy Eucharist and the other liturgical

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: rites and to discharge faithfully the sacred office of teaching, following Christ the Head and Shepherd, not seeking any gain, but moved only by zeal for souls?

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: BISHOP: As for you, dearest sons and daughters, pray for your Priests, that the Lord may pour out his gifts abundantly upon them and keep them faithful

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: as ministers of Christ, the High Priest, so that they may lead you to him, who is the source of salvation.

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: PEOPLE: Christ hear us. Christ graciously hear us.

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: BISHOP: and also pray for me, that I may be faithful to the apostolic office entrusted to me in my lowliness and that in your midst I may be made day by day

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: a living and more perfect image of Christ, the Priest, the Good Shepherd, the Teacher and the Servant of all.

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: PEOPLE: Christ hear us, Christ graciously hear us.BISHOP:May the Lord keep us all in his charity and lead all of us, shepherds and flock, to eternal life.
